Table 1
Demographics and risk factors of the cohort.
age (median (IQR))69.83 (56.99–74.42)
sex (f/m)133 / 93
hypertension (yes)143
diabetes (yes)24
hypercholesterolemia (yes)175
Body mass index (mean (SD))26.1 (4.4)
current smoker (yes)29

extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Abbreviations: FW = free water, NAWM = normal appearing white matter, WMH = white matter hyperintensity, AD = axial diffusivity, FA = fractional anisotropy, MD = mean diffusivity, RD = radial diffusivity; t = suffix for free water corrected tissue, nBV = normalized brain volume;*normalized and ln-transformed.

extracted-table.table-caption: Partial correlation between imaging variables and EF with a speed component, adjusted for age.
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Abbreviation: r = correlation coefficient, FW = free water, NAWM = normal appearing white matter, WMH = white matter hyperintensities, MD = mean diffusivity, FA = fractional anisotropy, AD = axial diffusivity, RD = radial diffusivity, t = suffix for free water corrected tissue,*exponentially transformed;**normalized and ln-transformed;***between group t-test (presented are T-score and p-value).

caption.p: Partial correlation between imaging variables and EF with a speed component, adjusted for age.

extracted-table.table-caption: Significant linear regression results of EF with a speed component regressed on FW in specific white matter tracts. All analysis are corrected for age and the risk factors hypertension, diabetes, hypercholesterolemia, BMI and smoking. Results are uncorrected for multiple comparisons.
extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Abbreviations: B = regression coefficient, Std. error = standard error, VIF = variance inflation factor, R2 change = variance explained by the specific tract.

caption.p: Significant linear regression results of EF with a speed component regressed on FW in specific white matter tracts. All analysis are corrected for age and the risk factors hypertension, diabetes, hypercholesterolemia, BMI and smoking. Results are uncorrected for multiple comparisons.

fn.p: Abbreviations: B = regression coefficient, Std. error = standard error, VIF = variance inflation factor, R2 change = variance explained by the specific tract.
